DescripcionBankPredictor:
Overview

The Predictive Banking App is a web application designed to predict whether a customer will accept or reject a fixed deposit based on their financial profile. It leverages a Random Forest model trained on real banking data, including key features such as age, job, marital status, and account balance. This tool helps banks and financial institutions anticipate customer behavior and make data-driven decisions.

Main Features

  • Intuitive Interface: Users can easily input customer data.
  • Real-Time Predictions: The model processes the entered data and predicts whether the customer will accept or reject the deposit.
  • Graphical Visualization: Results are displayed interactively using donut charts powered by Chart.js.
  • Data Analysis: Provides insights into the factors influencing customer decisions.
  • Speed and Optimization: The Machine Learning model is optimized for fast and accurate predictions.

Technologies Used

  • Frontend: Bootstrap, FontAwesome, Chart.js, CSS.
  • Backend: Python 3.13, Flask, Pandas, Scikit-learn.
  • Database: CSV files processed with Pandas.

Use Cases

  • Banks can assess the likelihood of customers accepting fixed deposits.
  • Financial institutions can tailor offers based on customer profiles.
  • Researchers can analyze trends in financial product adoption.
DescripcionPokedex:
Description

The Pokédex is a web application that allows users to explore and learn in detail about all Pokémon, including their stats, abilities, types, and moves. Additionally, users can view detailed information about each move, such as power, accuracy, and secondary effects. To ensure accurate and up-to-date data, the application utilizes the Pokémon API, providing official and comprehensive information.

Main Features

  • Complete Pokémon List: Access all Pokémon with details on base stats, types, abilities, and evolutions.
  • Move Exploration: Detailed information about each move, including type, power, accuracy, and additional effects.
  • Interactive and Dynamic Interface: Smooth navigation and optimized design for easy exploration.
  • Quick Search: Allows filtering Pokémon by name, type, or ability.
  • Responsive Design: The application is fully responsive and adapts to any screen size.

Technologies Used

  • Frontend: React, Bootstrap, CSS.
  • Backend: JavaScript.
  • API: Pokémon API to retrieve real-time data.
DescripcionAdminPanel:
Description

MG Admin is a base admin panel designed as a foundation for other projects. It provides essential modules for user, role, and permission management, along with a Dashboard displaying key system information. Its modular and scalable architecture allows easy adaptation to various requirements.

Main Features

  • Interactive Dashboard: Displays general statistics, including the total number of registered users.
  • User Management: Allows creating, editing, deleting, and viewing users.
  • Role and Permission Management: Assigns custom roles and permissions to control user access.
  • Security and Authentication: Implements secure session management with Flask.
  • Dynamic Interface: Responsive design optimized with Bootstrap and DataTables.js for a better user experience.

Technologies Used

  • Backend: Python, Flask.
  • Frontend: JavaScript, Bootstrap, CSS.
  • Additional Libraries: SweetAlert2 for interactive alerts, FontAwesome for icons, Chart.js for statistical graphs, and DataTables.js for interactive tables.
  • Database: Supabase.
